recommendations.action: 001 at RPM 1750 with a sample rate of 10kHz:
Continue regular data collection to establish baseline patterns over time. This will help in identifying deviations that may indicate emerging problems.

Investigate and implement advanced analytics, such as machine learning algorithms capable of detecting subtle changes indicative of early signs of wear or failure not immediately apparent through traditional analysis methods.
Review the sensor placement strategy to ensure optimal coverage for capturing representative vibration data from all critical components within Motor-001.
